law.catch_line: Eligibility for membership in federation -- Powers of federation.

text.section: Every county farm bureau organized pursuant to KRS 247.250 shall be eligible to membership in any said state federation, but after its admission to membership, said federation shall have power to suspend its membership or expel it for failure to comply with any bylaws or reasonable rule or regulation of the federation.

law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 7, effective June 19, 1952. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42d-19.
